title: Please fix your game
body: I just failed my promos because the client told me i had 30s to pick a champion, then it made me dodge saying i didnt pick a champ in time.

replies.body:
Were you able to pick a ban before the timer ran out? If you don't pick a ban, the client will assume you're afk since that's the most likely reason to not pick something. 

This could have also been a weird connection issue. Sometimes people are able to get into the game lobby, but then their connection goes dormant so they end up getting booted for afk. Go ahead and check out your network settings by following the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying extra attention to the steps on port forwarding and how to configure your DNS settings. Let me know how that goes, and if I need we can dig a little further.
